name: Fera
description:
Play as Little Kit, an adventuring animal researcher, as they explore undiscovered worlds and find new creatures. 

Help Little Kit befriend the animals they meet on their adventure and document your findings in your journal. What fantastical creatures will you and Little Kit discover on your travels?..

The team: Alex Maybloom, Aidan Murphy, Julia Genis, Dom Willmott, Thomas Coombes, Ben Specht

You can also check out the incredible soundtrack for the game here: 

https://soundcloud.com/coombsie-488650241/sets/ferra-soundtrack
